scripts.train: node src/train.js && cd gists/model && git add . && git commit -m 'bump' && git push && cd ../..
scripts.deploy: npm run build && sed -i 's/debug = true/debug = false/' build/index.js && npx webpack build --entry ./build/index.js -o ./gists/atlasapproxnlp --mode production && mv gists/atlasapproxnlp/main.js gists/atlasapproxnlp/atlasapproxnlp.js && cd gists/atlasapproxnlp && git add . && git commit -m 'bump' && git push && cd ../..
scripts.testBrowser: npm run build && npx webpack build --entry ./build/index.js -o ./test --mode development && mv test/main.js test/index.js && firefox test/index.html
scripts.testNpm: npm run buildNpm && cp index.js test/atlasapprox-nlp.js && npx webpack serve ./test/webpack.js --static ./test --open /webpack.html --mode development
